segments.text: Thanks for inviting me to work out with you , Joan .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Don't mention it , let's go in .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yeah , this place looks great . Wow , look at her , she can certainly get down , can't she ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: She sure can . Are you jealous , Leslie ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: A little , I wish I could do that .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You can ! With a little practice .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How do they all get in such tiptop shape ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Exercised over and over . Exercise is a key .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's it . I decided to turn over a new leaf . I'm going to exercise every single day .
segments.speaker: S1
